name: Peter Coyote
description:
Today, on IndianOrNotIndian.com...

Wait, that's not right. Today on NativeAmericanOrNotNativeAmerican.com...

Sigh. That just doesn't roll off your tongue. Anyway, let's get straight to the point: many think that actor Peter Coyote is Native American, because of his last name, natch. Well, guess what:
